name: cdk-stacks
description: Amazon Connect Global Resiliency starter project

scripts.install:all: npm run install:webapp && npm run install:cdk-stacks && npm run install:lambdas && npm run install:lambda-layer
scripts.echo:cdk-frontend-stack-physical-name: aws ssm get-parameter --query 'Parameter'.'Value' --name $(npm run --silent echo:cdk-frontend-stack-name-param) --output text
scripts.echo:web-app-bucket: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name $(npm run --silent echo:cdk-frontend-stack-physical-name) --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`webAppBucket`].OutputValue' --output text
scripts.sync-config:webapp: aws s3 cp s3://$(npm run --silent echo:web-app-bucket)/$(npm run --silent echo:web-app-root-prefix)frontend-config.js ../webapp/
scripts.cdk:deploy:gitbash: npm run cdk:remove:context && winpty cdk.cmd deploy --all --disable-rollback
scripts.build:deploy:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run cdk:deploy
scripts.build:deploy:all:gitbash: npm run build:frontend:gitbash && npm run cdk:deploy:gitbash

author: prod-apps-builder-team
